content.rendered:
Is it time for you to move towards a new, challenging, and rewarding work environment? Have you left full-time work but are not ready to retire?

This might just be the opportunity you have been searching for.

At Little’s Chauffeur Drive, we pride ourselves on delivering exceptional, bespoke chauffeur services across Scotland and beyond. Established in 1966, our family-run business has become a trusted name in luxury transportation, known for our commitment to excellence, attention to detail, and personal touch. Despite our huge growth over five decades, traditional family business values are at the core of everything we do. We provide a friendly, welcoming, respectful, and inclusive workplace; we truly value each and every member of our team; and we are committed to leaving a lasting legacy for our people and the environment.

As part of that commitment:

  • We are a Real Living Wage employer.
  • We offer a comprehensive induction and training programme.
  • We offset all our carbon emissions via Trees for Life.
  • We offer opportunities to be part of our future strategy. Why not join our “green team”?
  • Our team take part in fundraising events for our company charity.
  • We arrange social and team building events throughout the year.

Little’s and You

Our chauffeurs are the face of our company, however at Little’s, they are so much more than a driver. Our chauffeurs act as concierges on the road providing a safe, punctual, helpful, secure and informed experience. They keep our vehicles clean and they are also part of a large supportive team of fellow chauffeurs, reservations/sales staff, and senior management working together to offer the best customer service in the industry.

The work is exciting and varied and involves driving our fleet of luxurious vehicles and looking after business, leisure, corporate and event clients while always supplying the same five-star service and showing them the absolute best of Scotland.

Are you the person we’re looking for?

We need people who can demonstrate first class driving skills, who have the history of excellence in customer service that our clients expect, and who can show a willingness to improve their skills and knowledge. You may have experience as a chauffeur, in professional driving or the hospitality industry; you may have spent time in public service or you may just be looking to change direction but whatever your background, you must have a can-do attitude, a desire to learn new skills and be able to manage your time effectively. An ability to speak another language as well as English is always welcome and driving qualifications from a previous profession or from ROSPA or IAM are advantageous. Full training is provided but you absolutely must bring flexibility and positivity.

At Little’s we operate a 24-hour, 7 day a week business; our lights are always on, so working hours can be any time of the day or night and we are looking for the right people to fill early hours posts.

· This involves a guaranteed 6 hour shift on a four days on / four days off basis between early May and 30 September.

· Start times for these shifts will vary according to business demands but will be between 0200hrs and 0700hrs. There may also be a requirement to work overtime on those days.

Our Promise

Living Wage Hourly Rate – our rate of pay is £12.60 per hour and the successful candidates will be entitled to paid holidays. A £250 performance related bonus will be paid on completion of the five-month period assuming that it has been accident free.

Supportive Team – we look after each other, that’s how we do business and that’s why we’re a success.

Full Induction and Ongoing Training – because every day provides an opportunity to learn and be better.

Full Uniform and Equipment – we supply equipment and your full uniform. We take pride in our appearance, and we know from our clients that first impressions count – but that’s just the beginning…. we maintain those same high standards across the customer experience.

Are you a fit?

If you think Little’s is the place for you, please submit your CV and tell us why you are the ideal person for us. (Email recruitmentatlittles@gmail.com and chris.carmichael@littles.co.uk).

Application question(s):

  • Do you have a full driving licence?
  • How long have you held a full licence?
  • You have read about who we’re looking for so tell us why you are that person. Tell us about your driving experience; your commitment to customer service and attention to detail; and your unique skills that you will bring to the role.

Full reference checks will be made prior to any successful candidate starting and a high-level security clearance check will be carried out during induction.

Job Types: Part-time, Temporary, Fixed term contract
Contract length: 5 months

Pay: £12.60 per hour

Additional pay:

  • Performance bonus

Licence/Certification:

  • Driving Licence (required)

Work Location: In person

Application deadline: 28/04/2025
Expected start date: 01/05/2025
